summary: Predict values from a Random Forest model
description: Applies a Random Forest Model to a raster cube objects. The raster data cube necessarily needs the same bands as the predictors in the model. Otherwise, an `IncompatibleBands` must be returned.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: A raster cube with the bands corresponding to the predictors.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A model object that can be trained with the ``fit_regr_random_forest()`` process.

returns.description: A raster data cube with the prediction of the target variable based on the model.

IncompatibleBands.message: The bands provided do not match the bands that the model has been trained for.
